Role Description  This is a full-time remote role for a Chief Human Resources Officer located in the Dallas-Fort Worth Metroplex. The Chief Human Resources Officer will be responsible for overseeing all aspects of human resources management, including developing and implementing HR policies, managing employee relations, talent management, and performance management. The role will also involve leading and mentoring the HR team, ensuring compliance with employment laws and regulations, and collaborating with senior management to align HR strategies with business goals.     Qualifications  Human Resources (HR) management and experience with HR Policies Strong skills in Employee Relations and Talent Management Experience in Performance Management Knowledge of employment laws and regulations Excellent leadership and team management skills Strong communication and interpersonal skills Bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Business Administration, or related field (Master's preferred) Professional certification (e.g., SHRM-CP, SHRM-SCP, PHR, SPHR) is a plus
